summary: This is a daily assignment roster for the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York, NY, dated Tuesday, July 23, 2019. It details staff post assignments, shift changes, and leave statuses for correctional officers and administrative personnel. The document is significant as it provides a snapshot of the facility's staffing on a date when Jeffrey Epstein was incarcerated there.
locations: MCC New York, New York, NY
keyFacts: The document is a staff roster for the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York for July 23, 2019.
It details shift assignments, posts (including 'Suicide Watch', 'SHU' (Special Housing Unit), and 'ATTY CONF' (Attorney Conference)), and leave statuses for correctional staff.
The roster shows operational details like overtime occurrences (18) and comptime occurrences (1) for that day.
The document is dated the day before Jeffrey Epstein was found unresponsive in his cell at the MCC on July 24, 2019.
It includes standard administrative categories for staff status: Day Off, Sick Leave, Annual Leave, LWOP, AWOL, Suspension, and Official Time.
